docs.lead_paragraph: CAMBRIDGE, Mass. THE party, in the Cambridge Boat Club on the Charles, on the second warm night of spring, honors Nicholas Gagarin, Harvard '70. His novel, "Windsong," is published today.

headline.main: Voices of Harvard '70; Voices of Harvard '70 "Here, the less you read, the better you do on exams" They have learned to live with chaos--a form of education

docs.snippet: CAMBRIDGE, Mass. THE party, in the Cambridge  Boat Club on the Charles, on the second warm night of spring, honors Nicholas Gagarin, Harvard '70. His novel, "Windsong," is published today.
